thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Meryl Belverd
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Meryl Belverd

author: Meryl Belverd
title: Meryl Belverd
text:
Mr. Fleury swiftly filled my order and then amazingly packed it for a safe journey to my home. He then followed up to make sure it arrived undamaged.
The pictures of the chandelier I purchased were numerous and very clear which helped me make my decision.
What more could a shopper ask for except maybe his wonderful accent.
